hymn.title: Now the Lord our souls has fed
hymn.category: Preaching of the Gospel—The Nations' Call

layout.singingstanza: Now the Lord our souls has fed, With Him -- self, the Liv -- ing Bread; Fed us, sit -- ting at His feet, With the fin -- est of the wheat.

lyrics.stanza: Now the Lord our souls has fed, With Himself, the Living Bread; Fed us, sitting at His feet, With the finest of the wheat.
For, while we are feasting here, Starving millions, far and near, Call us with the bitter cry: Come and help us, or we die.
In this day of full increase, Shall we, can we, hold our peace? Staying here we do not well; Now then, let us go and tell:
